title: Brittany Mahomes says fame as Patrick Mahomesâ€™ wife has been emotionally hard
text: Brittany Mahomes, wife of NFL star Patrick Mahomes, has candidly shared her struggles with online hate. She revealed that while it's been a difficult journey, she's learned to protect her peace by stepping away from social media when negativity escalates. Despite facing criticism for her opinions and public presence, she remains a strong supporter of her husband and their family.
summary: Brittany Mahomes, wife of NFL star Patrick Mahomes, has candidly shared her struggles with online hate. She revealed that while it's been a difficult journey, she's learned to protect her peace by stepping away from social media when negativity escalates. Despite facing criticism for her opinions and public presence, she remains a strong supporter of her husband and their family.
